title: Voting system for more time
body:
Hi Riot,

Can we please make something in select screen for more time. 

I mean like a voting system (like the surrender system) in champion select screen to vote for another 30 sec or so to pick champs. Sometimes you need it. 

I was just in champ select and we had 2 adc's, 2 tops, 1 mid.... Everyone was arguing that they were not going to change their lane so I had to dodge as I knew I would not enjoy that game. Yet I am the one with 5min waiting period because of idiots. 

Can you implement a 30 sec voting system that if 3 people vote we all get 30 sec more to pick champs or change them. 

Just sometimes you need that little extra time. 

I can't tell you how many times I myself and many others had forgotten about masteries and runes until the last second but ran out of time. 
Those games are just not enjoyable and isn't that what you are trying to make of your game? Enjoyment?

I don't know because lately I do not see enjoyment. I see anger and competition, when this is supposed to be a video game for anyone to enjoy.

Have a think about where this game is going because I know that you are all aware that this game has gotten out of hand.
People have also died playing your game for too long. Do you even care? 

Whatever. Just stuff you need to think about for the future Riot

replies.body:
Hey bnfdiaoafvra,

While we do appreciate well thought out suggestions, because this is the Help & Support sub-boards, we try to limit posts to technical issues and general questions. As such, I’d like to direct you to the [General Discussion Boards](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion) and the [Miscellaneous Boards](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) for posting your League of Legends related suggestions. You’ll find there are a lot more community members in those two sub-boards for bouncing your ideas around and gathering support! 

Cheers!
